response.overview: Melo Kang had a pleasant life as a bank manager, until a misguided theft landed him in jail for 5 years. Melo exits prison for a crime he didn't fully commit. With a criminal record, finding a job is not easy. Melo works at a liquor store around the clock, waiting for a break to start a clean life over. Time passes with no opportunities in sight. In Melo's mind...you take any opportunity. Melo befriends Naya, a regular at the liquor store who is struggling with her own future. Melo and Naya go on a little trip that leads him into another crime he didn't fully commit. Will Melo understand what is missing in his life?
response.title: To Be MELO
